name: A Very Unfair Platformer
description:
If you love a challange and know how to keep your nerves this game is right for you.

This platformer might seem very unfair at first, and you are right, it is very unfair.

The only way you can progress in this game is to fail over and over again, but you will feel better and the game will be easier after each failure.

Music: https://soundimage.org/funny-4/

This is a link to download a video with the game solution.

https://mega.nz/file/TvQlFQSR#HEJy0jGDu6SRIUTmrc6-Lb0YFMIzgtrk6ILOgnfEX4w
